#summary How to get Transmuter for use
#labels Featured,Phase-Use

You can either download it directly from the [http://code.google.com/p/transmuter/downloads/list Downloads] page, or add it as a Maven dependency:

  * The repository:
{{{
<repository>
  <id>transmuter-releases</id>
  <url>http://transmuter.googlecode.com/svn/repos/releases</url>
</repository>
}}}

  * And the actual dependency:
{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.googlecode.transmuter</groupId>
  <artifactId>transmuter</artifactId>
  <version>0.2</version>
</dependency>
}}}
